nodes.text: RS-32 was an XQ4 Platform space installation used by the Rebel Alliance. It housed the magnetic pulse warhead technology.

The space station came under attack by Imperial forces under the command of Admiral Thrawn. Despite fighter defenses of Z-95s and T-wings, and Rebel assistance from two Assassin-class corvettes called Rampart, B-wing starfighters, RZ-1 A-wing interceptors, and T-65 X-wing starfighters, the station was captured, and the technology fell into Imperial hands.
However, the Imperials were not able to hold the station for long, as Demetrius Zaarin's forces made a surprise attack and destroyed the facility.
